name: media
schema: CREATE TABLE "media" (`author` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `event_date` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `event_name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `featured_order` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `file` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `file_size` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `is_featured` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `media_type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `organization` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `published_at` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `thumbnail` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
